entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of freezing rain beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
